short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time zone and local time converter. Compare and convert time between many locations at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time zone and city time converter between multiple locations worldwide. 
Converter allows find, add and compare over 100,000 cities and about 300 time zones. 
Converts times instantly as you type, in both direction.

To help us improve, we would love to hear your feedback and any suggestions for future updates.
